text:
Home » Features , Travel & Food » Loy Krathong celebration on the beach at Amari Phuket Loy Krathong celebration on the beach at Amari Phuket Written by Phuketindex | October 19, 2015 | 0 | Experience Thailand’s most beautiful festival with fantasy floating! 
Phuket, 19 October 2015 – The story goes back seven centuries to the year 1292. On the night of the full moon during the 12th lunar month, people would gather along riverbanks to float (“loy”) woven banana leaf baskets (“krathong”) containing candles, incenses and flowers, giving thanks to the goddess of the river for providing enough water to sustain their lives. Sometimes parted lovers would send their thoughts and wishes along with their krathong. 
Amari Phuket invites guests to celebrate this important festival with its special offering – the Loy Krathong Package, available for stays from 23 to 28 November 2015 . Every room category is part of the package, with a minimum three-night stay. Package price starts at 20,655 THB+++ for a four-day and three-night stay , with many add-on benefits including: Round-trip airport transfer A 20% discount on F&B for the whole period of stay Complimentary late checkout until 16:00 In the evening of Loy Krathong on 25 November 2015, a special Thai cuisine buffet will be offered, with a cultural show and complimentary krathong for floating in the ocean. There will also be a Miss Noppamas Beauty Contest. 
For more information about room reservations, please contact +66 (0) 7634 0106-14 extension 8033 and 8034, email us at reservations.phuket@amari.com or visit our website www.amari.com/phuket .
